products.name: 300W Solar flood light (AW RGB Rhythm) (KTL-101A2)
Neelux 30 Watt Solar Flood Light
products.description: Neelux 30 Watt Solar Flood Light

products.name: MODI 100 Watts LED Solar Flood Light MD-PT77 Series

specifications.Color Temperature: Color Temperature options available, e.g., Day Light (6000K)

products.description:
Operational Performance: Rated Wattage of 100W, providing high-intensity illumination equivalent to a traditional 500W floodlight.
Input Voltage: Operates at 6.4V, ensuring compatibility with standard power sources.
Luminous Flux: Offers a high luminous flux output, ensuring bright and consistent lighting.
Energy Efficiency: Utilizes LED technology for energy-efficient operation, reducing electricity consumption and costs.
Durable Construction: Built with quality materials for long-lasting performance in outdoor environments.
IP Rating: Possesses an IP65 rating, providing protection against dust and water ingress, making it suitable for outdoor use.
Sleek Design: Features a modern and compact design that enhances the aesthetics of any outdoor space.
Wide Application: Suitable for various outdoor lighting needs, including security lighting, architectural lighting, and landscape illumination.

products.name: Felicity 30Amps MPPT Solar Charge Controller | 12V/24V
products.description:
MPPT 30A/40A/50A/60A solar charge controller
100% MPPT technology
0 Layer, easy installation, easy setup
Built-in MCU controller with high performance
Automatic switch for 12V/24V/48V battery bank
3-stage charging optimizes battery performance
Overcharge protection, Input PV polarity reverse protection, Output limited current protection,Over-temperature protection
Suitable for battery types such as sealed lead acid, vented gel, and lithium battery, etc
Easy to be mounted

products.name: Victron Smart Solar MPPT 450/100-TR Charge Controller
products.description:
The MPPT VE.Can SmartSolar charger uses the latest and fastest technology to convert energy from a solar array into energy that optimally charges a battery banks.
The SmartSolar charge controller will even recharge a severely depleted battery. It can operate with a battery voltage as low as 0 Volts, provided the cells are not permanently sulphated or otherwise damaged.

products.name: Huawei LUNA Power Module Controller
products.description:
Huawei LUNA Power Module Controller

Built-In Energy Optimizer: Improves energy throughput by over 40%, enhancing overall efficiency.
Compact and Lightweight: Dimensions of 590 mm x 255 mm x 150 mm and a weight of just 10 kg for ease of installation.
Smart Energy Management: Supports real-time data collection and control of energy operations .
Scalability: Compatible with various LUNA battery modules, allowing for flexible system expansion .
Durability: Designed for long-term reliability in demanding environments.

products.name: SRNE 12 kW Hybrid Solar Inverter | 48 V Three‑Phase HESP48120SH3

specifications.MPPT Input Power: 9 000 W + 9 000 W (2 × MPPT), OC voltage up to 800 V each
specifications.Certifications: IEC62109‑1/2, EN61000‑6‑1/3, FCC Class B, RoHS

products.description:
12 kW Continuous / 24 kVA Peak Output – Powers high-load three-phase appliances, motors, and compressors


True Three-Phase Pure Sine-Wave Output – Clean, stable AC power across all three phases


Two Independent MPPT Channels – Each up to 9 kW, boasting 99.9% efficiency for solar harvesting


Hybrid Charging (PV/Grid/Gen) – Supports up to 200 A, enabling rapid battery recharging and generator power use


IP65 Rated Enclosure – Dustproof and waterproof for outdoor mounting


Download DataSheet: Datasheet_SRNE_HESP Series_8-12kW SH3_EU_Three-Phase_ Solar Hybrid Inverter_V1.1

products.name: SRNE 12kW Hybrid Solar Inverter Single‑Phase | 48 V HESP

specifications.Battery Voltage: 48 V DC (supports 48 V Li-ion or lead-acid)
specifications.PV Input: Dual MPPT, 2 × 6.6 kW, up to 500 V DC each
specifications.Parallel Capacity: Up to 6 units (single- or three-phase setups)
specifications.Certifications: IEC 62109‑1/2, EN 61000, FCC Class B, RoHS

products.description:
12 kW Continuous / 24 kVA Peak Output – Powers heavy home and light‑commercial loads like motors, A/Cs, pumps


Dual MPPT Inputs – Two independent MPPT channels rated up to 500 V with ~99.9% tracking efficiency.


Hybrid Charging Modes – Offers PV‑only, grid/generator priority, solar priority, and hybrid modes for optimized power use.


IP65-Rated Enclosure – Fully dust and water resistant, suitable for outdoor installation


Download DataSheet: Datasheet_SRNE_HESP Series_8-12kW SH3_EU_Three-Phase_ Solar Hybrid Inverter_V1.1

products.name: SRNE 8kW Hybrid Solar Inverter | 48V HESP

specifications.Certifications: IEC 62109‑1/2, EN 61000, FCC Class B, RoHS

products.description:
8 kW Continuous / 17.6 kVA Peak Output – Handles heavy appliances, motors, and air conditioners with ease


Dual MPPT Inputs – Two independent 500 V DC channels with ~99.9% tracking efficiency, supporting large PV arrays


IP65 Waterproof Enclosure – Suitable for outdoor installations without special protection


Hybrid & AC-Coupling Support – Integrates PV, battery, grid, and generator power with automatic switchover modes


Parallel Expandability (1–6 units) – Scalable solar power up to 48 kW for future system expansion


Download DataSheet: Datasheet_SRNE_HESP Series_8-12kW SH3_EU_Three-Phase_ Solar Hybrid Inverter_V1.1

products.name: SRNE 6 kW Hybrid Solar Inverter | 48 V HESP

specifications.MPPT Inputs: 2 × up to 500 V DC, max 22 A per channel, 99.9% eff.
specifications.Certifications: IEC 62109‑1/2, EN61000, FCC Class B, RoHS
specifications.Communication: RS485, CAN, USB, dry contacts; Wi-Fi/GPRS optional

products.description:
6 kW Continuous / 12 kVA Peak Output – Supports high-load appliances including motors and A/Cs


Dual MPPT Inputs – Flexible panel configuration with independent 500 V DC channels and 99.9% tracking efficiency


Hybrid Charging Modes – Combine PV, grid, generator, and battery charging with time-slot peak-shaving functionality


Generator & AC Coupling Support – Seamless integration with gensets and grid; supports AC-coupling


IP65 Certified – Fully weatherproof casing ideal for outdoor installations


DownLoad  DataSheet: SRNE_HESP series_EU_48V_4～6kW_230V_Solar Storage Inverter_Datasheet_V1.0

products.name: SRNE 6kW Hybrid Solar Inverter | 48V HYP4860

specifications.Solar Input: Dual MPPT, up to 500 V DC each
specifications.Protections: Over-/under-voltage, short-circuit, reverse polarity, thermal, surge

products.description:
6 kW Continuous + 12 kVA Peak Output – Handles high-powered appliances like motors, pumps, fridges, and air conditioners .


Dual MPPT (500 V DC each) – Enables efficient solar input with high tracking accuracy and flexible panel configurations.


100 A Hybrid Charging – Fast combined PV/grid/generator charging ensures quick replenishment of storage systems.


IP65-rated Rugged Enclosure – Fully dust- and waterproof for indoor or outdoor installations.

products.name: SRNE 5kW Hybrid Solar Inverter | 48V HYP4850
products.description:
SRNE 5KVA 48V hybrid pure sinewave inverter with an inbuilt MPPT solar charge controller rated 80A.
Due to its compactness and seamlessly lower fan noise, the inverter can be installed indoors or outdoors but on a secured area.
The inverter supports a variety of batteries ranging from lithium iron batteries,  gel batteries, AGM batteries, flooded batteries and tubular batteries.
It has a higher input solar current rating of up to 80A.

products.name: SRNE 3kW Hybrid Solar Inverter | 24V HF 108 Vdc

specifications.MPPT: 1 × 60 A (~99.9% efficiency), PV input max 108 V DC
specifications.Charging Currents: 60 A solar / 80 A grid / 140 A hybrid
specifications.Protection Features: Over-/under-voltage, short-circuit, reverse polarity, overload, thermal
specifications.Cooling & Protection: Fan-cooled, IP20 indoor only, operating temp –10 to 55 °C

products.description:
SRNE 3kW Hybrid Solar Inverter

High Efficiency: Employs advanced Maximum Power Point Tracking (MPPT) technology with up to 99.9% efficiency, optimizing solar energy utilization.
Pure Sine Wave Output: Delivers high-quality pure sine wave AC power, ensuring compatibility with various appliances and reliable long-term performance.
Multiple Charging Modes: Offers four charging modes—Only Solar, Mains Priority, Solar Priority, and Mains & Solar hybrid charging—providing flexibility to meet diverse application requirements.
Battery Compatibility: Supports various battery types, including Sealed, Flooded, GEL, Lithium Iron Phosphate (LFP), and Ternary batteries, with adjustable settings to accommodate specific energy storage needs.

Download dataSheet: SRNE_HFP series_48V_5kW_parallel connection_off grid solar charge inverter_datasheet_V1.0-1

products.name: SRNE 1.5 kW Hybrid Solar Inverter | 12V HF1215

specifications.Charging Modes: PV only, Grid priority, PV priority, Hybrid

products.description:
Hybrid Functionality – Integrates PV charging, grid/generator backup, and inverter output seamlessly


Pure Sine-Wave Output – Provides clean, reliable power for sensitive electronics


60 A MPPT – High tracking efficiency (~99.9%) maximizes solar energy harvest


Smart Charging Modes – PV only, grid/generator first, PV first, or hybrid charging


DSP & SPWM Technology – Fast and stable power conversion with digital control

products.name: Luminous 2500 VA Optimus Inverter Charger | 24V EXP 2800+

specifications.Display: Smart LCD with fault and performance logs
specifications.Backup Time: Varies based on battery capacity & load

products.description:
High-Capacity 2500 VA Output – Ideal for running multiple appliances during power outages.


Pure Sine Wave Technology – Ensures noise-free and stable performance for sensitive electronics.


Smart LCD Display – Real-time monitoring of load, battery status, input/output voltage, and errors.


24V Dual Battery System – Supports longer backup and better load distribution.


ABCC Charging Technology – Adaptive charging extends battery life and efficiency.


Supports Multiple Battery Types – Compatible with tubular, flat plate, and SMF batteries.

products.name: Luminous 1600 VA Optimus Inverter Charger | 24V EXP

specifications.Dimensions (approx.): 320 x 275 x 140 mm (L x W x H)

products.description:
Pure Sine Wave Output – Safe for sensitive electronics, ensures noiseless and stable operation.


Smart LCD Display – Shows real-time information like battery level, load, backup time, etc.


24V System (Dual Battery Support) – Ideal for longer backup and reduced battery load.


ABCC Technology – Intelligent battery charging for longer battery life and better performance.


Eco & UPS Mode – Switch between energy-saving and high-performance modes easily.


Supports Multiple Battery Types – Compatible with flat plate, tubular, and SMF batteries.

products.name: Luminous 1100 VA LithiumVerter Inverter Charger | All in One

specifications.Technology: Pure Sine Wave with Lithium Battery

products.description:
Pure Sine Wave Output – Ensures the safety of sensitive appliances and noise-free performance.


Smart LCD Display – Real-time insights on power status, load, and backup time.


ABCC Technology – Adaptive Battery Charging Control for efficient charging and longer battery life.


Battery Compatibility – Works with flat plate, tubular, and SMF batteries.


Eco and UPS Mode – Choose between energy-saving mode and performance mode.


Fast Charging – Optimized for faster battery charging even with low input voltage.

products.name: Luminous 1100 VA Optimus Inverter Charger | 12V

specifications.Dimensions: 275 x 250 x 120 mm (L x W x H)

products.description:
Pure Sine Wave Output – Ensures the safety of sensitive appliances and noise-free performance.


Smart LCD Display – Real-time insights on power status, load, and backup time.


ABCC Technology – Adaptive Battery Charging Control for efficient charging and longer battery life.


Battery Compatibility – Works with flat plate, tubular, and SMF batteries.


Eco and UPS Mode – Choose between energy-saving mode and performance mode.


Fast Charging – Optimized for faster battery charging even with low input voltage.

products.name: Luminous 1100 VA EcoVolt Neo Inverter Charger | 12V
products.description:
1100 VA Pure Sine Wave Inverter – protects appliances and ensures noiseless performance


12V Single Battery System – efficient and easy battery replacement


Supports wide voltage range for grid input (110V–285V)


Advanced PCB Programming – enhances performance and durability


Smart Charge+ Technology for faster battery charging

products.name: Luminous 5kVA SolarVerter Pro Hybrid Solar Inverter | 48V MPPT
products.description:
5 kVA Hybrid Inverter with 48V battery compatibility


In-built MPPT charge controller for up to 98% solar efficiency


Intelligent Energy Management – auto switch between solar, battery, and grid


LCD Display for real-time monitoring of system performance


Compatible with solar panels up to 5000W


Supports remote monitoring and load prioritization

products.name: Luminous 500 VA NXG+ Hybrid Solar Inverter | 12V PWM
products.description:
500 VA hybrid inverter with built-in 12V PWM solar charge controller


Intelligent Solar Optimization Technique (ISOT) for better solar energy utilization


Battery type selector switch for compatibility with flat plate, tubular, and SMF batteries


Fast charging with intelligent load sharing between solar and grid


LED indicators for system status

products.name: Felicity 50kW Hybrid Ongrid Solar Inverter | High Voltage Three Phase IVGM50KHP3G1
products.description:
50kW Rated Power – Ideal for industrial and commercial setups


Three-Phase Output – Suitable for heavy-load applications


High Voltage Compatibility – Enhanced efficiency with LFP (LiFePO4) batteries


Four MPPTs – Optimized solar energy harvesting


Smart Monitoring – Supports WiFi and Fsolar Cloud Monitoring System

products.name: Felicity 6kVA Hybrid Solar Inverter | 48V Low Frequency IVPM6048
products.description:
Felicity 6 kVA Hybrid Solar Inverter | 48V Low Frequency IVPM6048

Bypass charging function, AC charge available when the unit off
90-280V AC Widely input voltage Grid electricity and battery power priority is optional.
Higher charge current and adjustable Built-in our MPPT charge controller.
Intelligent protection, high class of security.

products.name: Felicity 2kVA Hybrid Solar Inverter | 24V High Frequency IVCM2024 PRO
products.description:
Rated Power: 3500VA / 3500W


High-frequency pure sine wave output


Integrated MPPT solar charge controller


24V DC input system – ideal for mid-range battery banks


LCD display for real-time status monitoring


Configurable AC/solar charging current

products.name: Felicity 1kVA Hybrid Solar Inverter | 12V High Frequency IVCM1012 PRO
products.description:
Rated Power: 3500VA / 3500W


High-frequency pure sine wave output


Integrated MPPT solar charge controller


24V DC input system – ideal for mid-range battery banks


LCD display for real-time status monitoring


Configurable AC/solar charging current

products.name: Must 10 kVA Hybrid Solar Inverter 48V | Low Frequency Offgrid VPM

products.description:

products.name: 300W Solar flood light (AW RGB Rhythm) (KTL-101A2)

specifications.Lighting mode: Light on at dusk, Light off at dawn   Auto.

products.name: Neelux 30 Watt Solar Flood Light
products.description: Neelux 30 Watt Solar Flood Light

products.name: MODI 100 Watts LED Solar Flood Light MD-PT77 Series

specifications.Color Temperature: Color Temperature options available, e.g., Day Light (6000K)

products.description:
Operational Performance: Rated Wattage of 100W, providing high-intensity illumination equivalent to a traditional 500W floodlight.
Input Voltage: Operates at 6.4V, ensuring compatibility with standard power sources.
Luminous Flux: Offers a high luminous flux output, ensuring bright and consistent lighting.
Energy Efficiency: Utilizes LED technology for energy-efficient operation, reducing electricity consumption and costs.
Durable Construction: Built with quality materials for long-lasting performance in outdoor environments.
IP Rating: Possesses an IP65 rating, providing protection against dust and water ingress, making it suitable for outdoor use.
Sleek Design: Features a modern and compact design that enhances the aesthetics of any outdoor space.
Wide Application: Suitable for various outdoor lighting needs, including security lighting, architectural lighting, and landscape illumination.

products.description: Elevate your outdoor lighting with TNTorch Solar Flood Lights 300W – the ultimate solution for powerful illumination and enhanced security. Harness the sun’s energy for cost-efficient, eco-friendly lighting that’s perfect for diverse outdoor spaces.

products.name: Felicity 30Amps MPPT Solar Charge Controller | 12V/24V
products.description:
MPPT 30A/40A/50A/60A solar charge controller
100% MPPT technology
0 Layer, easy installation, easy setup
Built-in MCU controller with high performance
Automatic switch for 12V/24V/48V battery bank
3-stage charging optimizes battery performance
Overcharge protection, Input PV polarity reverse protection, Output limited current protection,Over-temperature protection
Suitable for battery types such as sealed lead acid, vented gel, and lithium battery, etc
Easy to be mounted

products.name: Victron Smart Solar MPPT 450/100-TR Charge Controller
products.description:
The MPPT VE.Can SmartSolar charger uses the latest and fastest technology to convert energy from a solar array into energy that optimally charges a battery banks.
The SmartSolar charge controller will even recharge a severely depleted battery. It can operate with a battery voltage as low as 0 Volts, provided the cells are not permanently sulphated or otherwise damaged.

products.name: Huawei LUNA Power Module Controller
products.description:
Huawei LUNA Power Module Controller

Built-In Energy Optimizer: Improves energy throughput by over 40%, enhancing overall efficiency.
Compact and Lightweight: Dimensions of 590 mm x 255 mm x 150 mm and a weight of just 10 kg for ease of installation.
Smart Energy Management: Supports real-time data collection and control of energy operations .
Scalability: Compatible with various LUNA battery modules, allowing for flexible system expansion .
Durability: Designed for long-term reliability in demanding environments.
